about.summary: A set of measures of dissimilarity between time series to perform time series clustering. Metrics based on raw data, on generating models and on the forecast behavior are implemented. Some additional utilities related to time series clustering are also provided, such as clustering algorithms and cluster evaluation metrics.

name: r-tsclust
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.2.4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-tsclust
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/TSclust_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/TSclust/TSclust_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d47106da32ebd9c7c172897e91472bc49d3b173fdf7597be64288992975f0636

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libgl-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-dri-drivers') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libselinux') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxdamage') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxxf86vm') }}  # [linux]
    - xorg-libxfixes  # [linux]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-kernsmooth
    - r-cluster
    - r-dtw
    - r-locpol
    - r-longitudinaldata
    - r-pdc
    - r-wmtsa
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-kernsmooth
    - r-cluster
    - r-dtw
    - r-locpol
    - r-longitudinaldata
    - r-pdc
    - r-wmtsa

test:
  requires:
    - xorg-libxfixes  # [linux]
  commands:
    - LD_LIBRARY_PATH=${BUILD_PREFIX}/x86_64-conda_cos6-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/lib64 $R -e "library('TSclust')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('TSclust')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.jstatsoft.org/v62/i01/
  license: GPL-2
  summary: A set of measures of dissimilarity between time series to perform time series clustering.
    Metrics based on raw data, on generating models and on the forecast behavior are
    implemented. Some additional utilities related to time series clustering are also
    provided, such as clustering algorithms and cluster evaluation metrics.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: TSclust
# Type: Package
# Title: Time Series Clustering Utilities
# Version: 1.2.4
# Date: 2017-10-15
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Author: Pablo Montero Manso, JosA Antonio Vilar
# Maintainer: Pablo Montero <pmontm@gmail.com>
# Description: A set of measures of dissimilarity between time series to perform time series clustering. Metrics based on raw data, on generating models and on the forecast behavior are implemented. Some additional utilities related to time series clustering are also provided, such as clustering algorithms and cluster evaluation metrics.
# License: GPL-2
# URL: http://www.jstatsoft.org/v62/i01/
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.1), wmtsa, pdc, cluster
# Imports: locpol, KernSmooth, dtw, longitudinalData
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2017-10-15 19:42:51 UTC; pmont
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2017-10-16 23:13:27 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
